    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AnimationManager
    Manages animations created from a spritesheet.
    Armor
    Represents an armor item in the game.
    BaseCommand
    An abstract base class implementing the Command interface, providing default behavior for commands.
    Campfire
    Represents a campfire in the game world, which serves as a point of interaction for the player.
    CheckOverlapping
    Utility class for checking geometric overlaps and collisions.
    Clam_Boss
     
    Clam_Monster
     
    Command
    Represents a command pattern interface for executing various game actions.
    ConsumableItem
    Represents a consumable item in the game.
    ControlsMap
    Maps keyboard input to commands for controlling the player and game interactions.
    DebugUI
     
    Entity
    Represents a generic entity in the game, serving as a base class for specific entities such as players or monsters.
    GameScreen
    Main game class that manages the game screen.
    IllegalItemException
    Custom exception to indicate illegal operations involving items in the game.
    Inventory
    Represents a player's inventory in the game, managing items and equipment.
    InventoryUI
     
    Item
    Represents a generic item in the game.
    Main
    The main entry point of the game application.
    Map
    Represents a game map loaded from a Tiled map file.
    Memento
    Represents a Memento for saving and restoring the state of game entities.
    Monster
    Represents a monster entity in the game, extending the base `Entity` class.
    Node
    Represents a node in a grid-based pathfinding system.
    PathfindingManager
    Manages pathfinding using a grid-based system.
    Player
    Represents the player entity in the game, extending the base `Entity` class.
    PlayerUI
     
    Weapon
    Represents a weapon item in the game.
    ZeroSubTypeException
    Custom exception to indicate that a required subtype is missing or not defined.
